description: Provides a description of the certificate.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the certificates described in the form of key-value pairs. Valid values are certificate-arn and certificate-id. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 10

nested_items.name: Certificates
nested_items.description: The Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificates associated with the replication instance.

nested_items.name: CertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: A customer-assigned name for the certificate. Identifiers must begin with a letter and must contain only ASCII letters, digits, and hyphens. They can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.

nested_items.name: CertificateCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date that the certificate was created.

nested_items.name: CertificatePem
nested_items.description: The contents of a .pem file, which contains an X.509 certificate.

nested_items.name: CertificateWallet
nested_items.description: The location of an imported Oracle Wallet certificate for use with SSL. Example: filebase64("${path.root}/rds-ca-2019-root.sso")

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the certificate.

nested_items.name: ValidFromDate
nested_items.description: The beginning date that the certificate is valid.

nested_items.name: ValidToDate
nested_items.description: The final date that the certificate is valid.

nested_items.name: SigningAlgorithm
nested_items.description: The signing algorithm for the certificate.

nested_items.name: KeyLength
nested_items.description: The key length of the cryptographic algorithm being used.
